text: 10:10-11 Matyu 10:14; Luk 9:5; Aposel 13:51; 18:6Egh ia nguibar ekiatamɨn aven mangɨtɨma, me ia inighan koghtɨma, ia tuavir dozibar aven mangɨ mɨkɨm suam, ‘Ian nguibar ekiamɨn nguaziba en dagaribar poghezɨ, e da dɨsi, eghtɨ ia kamaghɨn ganigh fogh suam, ia amizir arazir kam, a derazir puvatɨ. Egh ia fogh suam, God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam roghɨra ize.’
